titleStmt.title: A tender salutation, or, The substance of a letter given forth by the Rationals, to the despised remnant and seed of God, in the people called Quakers by him, of whom the world is not worthy, known by the name of Roger Crabb O.
titleStmt.author: Crab, Roger, 1621?-1680.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
